components.description:
A large version of the small blue diamond emoji.

Note: this emoji is not supported in Twitter / X names, to minimize confusion with a verified checkmark. Learn more here.
components.title: Large Blue Diamond

description:
A large version of the small blue diamond emoji.

Note: this emoji is not supported in Twitter / X names, to minimize confusion with a verified checkmark. Learn more here.
title: Large Blue Diamond

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Geometric shapes
emoji_net_data.definition: Large Blue Diamond was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015. Copy and paste this emoji: Copy http://emojipedia.org/large-blue-diamond/
emoji_net_data.name: large blue diamond

apple_vendor_description: The large blue diamond emoji on Apple devices shines with a captivating sapphire-like brilliance, rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting. Its facets are meticulously crafted with smooth gradients, reflecting light in a way that emphasizes its preciousness and rarity. This emoji, with its cool, elegant azure tone, is often used to signify something valuable, luxurious, or exceptionally good.
